name: Polybius: Hypnosis
description:
Warning: there are flashing colors, loud noises, etc. If you are sensitive to these effects, TURN AWAY NOW.

w e l c o m e

POLYBIUS, is an old arcade game from 1981 that was created by the Government to hypnotize people who play it. It was kind of like ATARI'S TEMPEST. But, the game doesn't exist.

Or does it? Today, Sinneslochen partnered with us, to create POLYBIUS: HYPNOSIS

The game is still being developed, so please be patient with us as we make this experience better!

How to play:

Arrow keys to move

space to shoot.

dont touch the shapes, or the rays around the [[base]]

keep. shooting. the. base.
